title: 03/31/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 03/31/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Florio
description:
Mike Florio tells Dan how the process works in the Deshaun Watson 19 civil law suit cases. Mike says that the criminal courts have not been involved yet. Mike says Deshaun should deal with these cases; not make it go away, but deal with it.
